page.title: 19HIGH STREET SHOPS, CHALFORD
page.content: Opposite the Roundhouse is a second hand baby clothes shop called Noah's Ark.It used to be a grocery shop.Next door is Wickham Grange,this used to be a rich mill owner's house it is now flats.In the High Street is a Post Office,this sells food as well. Opposite the Post Office is a house where there used to be a shop,it is now privately owned.There is also a cottage called the Corner Cottage,on the gate are the intials of someone's name,it used to be owned by a blacksmith who made the gate.Further along is the Red Lion Pub,this is a newish building but a little further on is a house which used to be a pub called the Old Red Lion.All the way along the High Street are Cotswold stone houses and steep donkey paths leading up the hill.
